  <hr>
  <a name="_details"></a>
  <h2>Detailed Description</h2> A set of static methods that give users access to the main speech interaction components. These methods are the only ones exposed to other programming languages through the Java Native Interface. 
  <p> </p>
  <p> Definition at line <a class="el" href="_speech_interface_8java-source.html#l00032">32</a> of file <a class="el" href="_speech_interface_8java-source.html">SpeechInterface.java</a>.</p>
  <hr>

  <a class="anchor" name="e0" doxytag="voce::SpeechInterface::init"></a>
  <p> </p>
  <table class="mdTable" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0"> 
   <tbody>
    <tr> 
     <td class="mdRow"> 
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0"> 
       <tbody>
        <tr> 
         <td class="md" nowrap valign="top">static void voce.SpeechInterface.init </td> 
         <td class="md" valign="top">(&nbsp;</td> 
         <td class="md" nowrap valign="top">String&nbsp;</td> 
         <td class="mdname" nowrap> <em>vocePath</em>, </td> 
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td class="md" nowrap align="right"></td> 
         <td class="md"></td> 
         <td class="md" nowrap>boolean&nbsp;</td> 
         <td class="mdname" nowrap> <em>initSynthesis</em>, </td> 
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td class="md" nowrap align="right"></td> 
         <td class="md"></td> 
         <td class="md" nowrap>boolean&nbsp;</td> 
         <td class="mdname" nowrap> <em>initRecognition</em>, </td> 
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td class="md" nowrap align="right"></td> 
         <td class="md"></td> 
         <td class="md" nowrap>String&nbsp;</td> 
         <td class="mdname" nowrap> <em>grammarPath</em>, </td> 
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td class="md" nowrap align="right"></td> 
         <td class="md"></td> 
         <td class="md" nowrap>String&nbsp;</td> 
         <td class="mdname" nowrap> <em>grammarName</em></td> 
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td class="md"></td> 
         <td class="md">)&nbsp;</td> 
         <td class="md" colspan="2"><code> [static]</code></td> 
        </tr> 
       </tbody>
      </table> </td> 
    </tr> 
   </tbody>
  </table> 
  <table cellspacing="5" cellpadding="0" border="0"> 
   <tbody>
    <tr> 
     <td> &nbsp; </td> 
     <td> <p> Initializes Voce. The 'vocePath' String specifies the path where Voce classes and config file can be found. 'initSynthesis' and 'initRecognition' enable these capabilities; if you don't need one or the other, not initializing it will save load time and memory (though the feature will be disabled, of course). 'grammarPath' is a relative or absolute path to one or more grammar files (all .gram files in 'grammarPath' will automatically be searched). 'grammarName' is the name of a specific grammar within a .gram file in the 'grammarPath'. If the 'grammarName' is empty, a simple default grammar will be used. </p><p> Definition at line <a class="el" href="_speech_interface_8java-source.html#l00047">47</a> of file <a class="el" href="_speech_interface_8java-source.html">SpeechInterface.java</a>. </p><p> References <a class="el" href="_speech_interface_8java-source.html#l00035">voce.SpeechInterface.mRecognizer</a>, <a class="el" href="_speech_interface_8java-source.html#l00034">voce.SpeechInterface.mSynthesizer</a>, and <a class="el" href="_speech_interface_8java-source.html#l00168">voce.SpeechInterface.setRecognizerEnabled()</a>. </p></td> 
    </tr> 
   </tbody>
  </table>

This cancels all pending messages. </p><p> Definition at line <a class="el" href="_speech_interface_8java-source.html#l00125">125</a> of file <a class="el" href="_speech_interface_8java-source.html">SpeechInterface.java</a>. </p><p> References <a class="el" href="_speech_interface_8java-source.html#l00034">voce.SpeechInterface.mSynthesizer</a>, and <a class="el" href="_speech_synthesizer_8java-source.html#l00134">voce.SpeechSynthesizer.stopSynthesizing()</a>. </p></td>
